text: Max Marinko (1916-1975) was a Yugoslav and Czech international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== Marinko won a silver medal at the 1939 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team event for Yugoslavia. After World War II, he switched allegiance to Czechoslovakia and went on to win three more medals, two of which were gold, in the team event. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Yugoslav table tennis players Category:Czech male table tennis players Category:Canadian male table tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Ljubljana Category:1916 births Category:1975 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Max Marinko
